mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_course tc WHERE tc.is_deleted = 0

SELECT DISTINCT tc.id, tc.name, tc.subject, tc.grade, tc.profit from t_course tc left join t_schedule ts on tc.id = ts.course_id and ts.is_deleted = 0 left join t_schedule_teacher tst on tst.schedule_id = ts.id and tst.is_deleted = 0 where tst.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and tc.is_deleted = 0 ;

SELECT DISTINCT tc.id, tc.name, tc.subject, tc.grade, tc.profit from t_course tc left join t_schedule ts on tc.id = ts.course_id and ts.is_deleted = 0 left join t_schedule_student tss on tss.schedule_id = ts.id and tss.is_deleted = 0 where tss.student_id = #{studentId} and tc.is_deleted = 0 ;
SELECT tc.id, tc.name, tc.subject, tc.grade, tc.profit, tc.remark from t_course tc where tc.id = #{courseId} and tc.is_deleted = 0;

SELECT * FROM t_schedule s LEFT OUTER JOIN t_accounting_summary tas ON tas.schedule_id = s.id and tas.is_deleted = 0 LEFT OUTER JOIN t_schedule_teacher st ON st.schedule_id = s.id and st.is_deleted = 0 WHERE course_id = #{courseId} and s.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY s.course_date
SELECT student_id FROM t_schedule_student tss WHERE tss.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} and tss.is_deleted = 0
SELECT teacher_id FROM t_schedule_teacher tst WHERE tst.schedule_id = #{scheduleId} and tst.is_deleted = 0
